Author: nemesisdani
Text: I am going through the same. Dont want to be seen in public or go out ...trying to wear as.much clothes as possible to cover up my fat. I stay in all the time and end up bingeing late at night.  First hear I will welcome winter

Author: rosebleue
Text: Ugh Fuck summers. For some reason in summer I seem to gain weight NO MATTER what I do. And the heat makes me look and feel twice as big.
